title: BRIEF-Tata Motors Says Sept-Qtr JLR Retail Sales Fell 0.7%
text:
BRIEF-Tata Motors Says Sept-Qtr JLR Retail Sales Fell 0.7%

Stock Markets 29 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 17:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Tata Motors Says Sept-Qtr JLR Retail Sales Fell 0.7% Oct 7 (Reuters) - Tata Motors Ltd : * SAYS JAGUAR LAND ROVER RETAIL SALES FOR SEPT QUARTER FELL 0.7% Y/Y TO 128,953 VEHICLES * SEPT QUARTER JAGUAR RETAIL SALES 37,323 VEHICLES, DOWN 11.0%; LAND ROVER RETAILS 91,630 VEHICLES, UP 4.2% YEAR-ON-YEAR * JLR ACHIEVED DOUBLE-DIGIT GROWTH IN CHINA IN SEPT QUARTER

BRIEF-Tata Motors Says Sept-Qtr JLR Retail Sales Fell 0.7%
description: BRIEF-Tata Motors Says Sept-Qtr JLR Retail Sales Fell 0.7%
